subject: [WE-ADS] Reset Code For Your Password
body:
Dear ,

We recently received a request to reset the password for your WE-ADS account. Here is your reset code:

Please enter this code on the password reset site to change your password. Remember, this code will expire after seconds.

If you did not make this request please ignore this email. If you have any concerns about the security of your account, please contact our support team immediately at .

Best regards,

The WE-ADS Team
